feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Fiori
feed.subtitle: SAP Fiori Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Manage Sales Order (Version 2) - Custom Sales Items Table
entry.content:
We have a requirement in the Manage SO Version 2 Fiori app which is of type SAP FIori Elements and based on a V4 OData service. We have made a Custom Sales Items Table similar to the one we have in the Object Page for Sales Items for some additional functionality. This table opens in a dialog via a Custom Action Button in the Object Page.

Now, when we are adding/ updating any data in this Custom Line items table which is also binded to the Odata model, it is not getting reflected back onto the Standard Line items table without pressing Save button or reload button of browser. We have tried to programatically refresh the Odata V4 model and the list binding as well of the standard line items table but it is not giving us the latest snapshot of the data when we are in Edit mode of the page. 

Has anyone done this kind of requirement before ? Or know how to refresh the object page in edit mode ?

entry.title: Use Microsoft Entra Id to Secure CAP Fiori Application
entry.content:
I have an HTML5 application developed using SAP Fiori and CAP for Node.js. An XSUAA instance was created for security, and the application uses the Build Work Zone Managed App Router.

I want users to be able to browse the app even if they don’t have a BTP account. However, if they are part of our Microsoft tenant, they should be able to access and use the site.

I’m not sure how to achieve this. Any suggestions or resources would be highly appreciated. Thanks.

entry.title: Custom tile type creation for OnPremise
entry.content:
Hi All, 

I want to create a tile on the FLP with the radial chart for status, similar to below snap.

I started working towards it, please find further details and my progress below and let me know if I am on the right path and how to resolve it further, any help here would be appreciated?

I am trying to create a custom tile type for FLP. 
My requirement is to show 2 radial charts side by side on the main tile of FLP.

Till now I have created an app in BAS with chip file, registered the chip file and got my custom tile type on the launchpad designer (/ui2/flpd_cust), here it is blank but when I select it, I get my radial charts. (PFB).

                    

Now, the issue I am facing is when I add this tile configuration, all the buttons are greyed out, I am getting only create button enable, so I am not able to see this tile on FLP. 
Also, I tried to implement BADI "/UI2/BADI_FDM_PUB_CUST_TILE", but still all the buttons are disabled. Any help here would be appreciated. 

PS: Documents and blogs referred:
Implementing a Custom Tile Type | SAP Help Portal
Parameters of Interface /UI2/IF_BADI_FDM_PUB_CUST_TILE | SAP Help Portal

SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA SAP Fiori Launchpad SAPUI5 #chip #custom tile type

entry.title: Fiori evaluation request is in status: In Submission
entry.content:
Hi experts,

Group-Based Evaluation Requests are stuck In Submission (Lifecycle Status Code - 02).  Recently we applied Client export/import. No newly created requests in Evaluate Suppliers app after that. RFC authorization is fined as per note 2634526. Here are some logs from SLG1

Hierarchy SUBCONTRACTING does not contain any data
Hierarchy does not contain any data
Message no. RH508

Metering information missing for:
Message no. /IWFND/CM_COS127

Backend Error Log
Hierarchy SUBCONTRACTING does not contain any data

Browser Console Log
Assertion failed: C_SuplrEvalRspEvaluateST is not a valid EntityType

Could you guide me with that? Thanks

entry.title: I want to develop a Fiori app using capm service
entry.content: I have a service created using CAP (Cloud Application Programming Model), and I want to develop a Fiori application that can be deployed on a public URL, accessible to anyone. I need to know which approach I should follow: using a Page Map (Fiori Elements) or creating a Custom Page Fiori app.

entry.title: General Recommendation of maximum number of apps / app descriptors in 1 technical catalog?
entry.content:
Hello,

We were working in the structuring of the fiori apps for S4hana 2023. We have 1 business catalog per business role.

When it comes to custom technical catalog for all custom apps, we are thinking of having just 1 technical catalog overall and distribute the apps from it to business catalogs. So our question is will this impact the Performance in anyways if 1 Technical catalog has 1000 of apps ? what is the recommendation from SAP for Technical Catalog Size and structuring? Can't find this information in any sap help portals. 

@Jocelyn_Dart 

 

Thanks,

RK

entry.title: Updates on ODATA V2 Deprecation
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have confusion on latest rumors' on stopping support for ODATA v2 from SAP. I am not really finding any SAP note on that to get clear idea. Can someone help me to get it and also do you have idea on below points?

  • If ODATA v2 support is going to stop then what will happen to old service/integrations done with non-sap systems after system upgrade?
  • Are ODATA services created through SEGW comes under ODATA v2?
  • If creating ODATA services is not recommended in SEGW then how same can be done in v4 version(may be following RAP Model)?(Any blog or documentation on creating READ, UPDATE, CREATE Operations in ODATA v4 same like how we were doing in SEGW?)

Thanks for your time in reading my queries, please drop ur comments.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: Remove Cards from General Ledger Overview Fiori App (F2445)
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I tried to hide the two cards “Recognized Revenue” and “Recognized Cost of Sales” in the General Ledger Overview (F2445) app using Adapt UI / Adaptation Project in BAS.

While I am able to hide these cards at runtime, they can still be re-enabled by users through the Manage Cards option.

I would like to remove these cards completely from the root configuration, so that they cannot be enabled again by end users.

However, the “Remove Card” option appears to be disabled, as shown in the attached screenshots.
Could you please help me understand:

entry.title: Do we need to scheudle a job for report PPH_MRP_SET_CACHE to update shortages in Fiori Apps?
entry.content:
Dear Gurus,

While setting up MRP and the most relevant Fiori apps, I have come across an issue related to some Fiori apps (Monitor External Requirements, Manage External Requirements...).

After checking SAP note 3603703, I decided to run report PPH_MRP_SET_CACHE and update entries and I got the Fiori apps showing the correct data.

However, I wanted to know if this was actually something we would need to schedule in the background? I was expecting the information to be fully synch in Fiori with S4HANA. Is it not the case or might have be missing some configurations or activations?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: value help dropdown itself to show an explicit <empty> option?
entry.content:
I am working with a Value Help based on the annotation:

{
    $Type: 'Common.ValueListParameterIn',
    InitialValueIsSignificant: true,
    LocalDataProperty: id,
    ValueListProperty: 'ID'
}

InitialValueIsSignificant = true works correctly — if the field is empty, the value help filters for id eq '' and returns the correct results.

However, I also need the value help dropdown itself to show an explicit <empty> option, so that the user can actively choose an empty/null value.

Is there a standard way (annotation, UI5 parameter, or OData approach) to include an explicit <empty> option in a Value Help dropdown for a ValueListParameterIn?

entry.title: Is there a User Guide available for the MDK-based “Report Incident” mobile app?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am currently working on a Mobile App Assessment project and evaluating the Report Incident mobile application built using SAP Mobile Development Kit (MDK). I already have the installation and implementation guide, but I am specifically looking for the User Guide that explains how end-users can operate the app.

Could you please confirm if such a User Guide exists and share the link or resource where I can find it?

 
Thank you in advance!

entry.title: UI Theme Designer - custom theme parameters - How to
entry.content:
Hello,

i started working with UI Theme Designer cause we need to setup different color setting for each system in S/4 landscape. However, after setting some basic stuff i run into issue, that when i want to e.g. setup colors in Calendar, i have no idea which parameters should be set. There is no indication in Designer itself and i ended up with trial & error, but this is time consuming, e.g. for Calendar:

I want to have more saturated text and in my custom color scheme, but i am at loss where to look for. Is there any interactive help in Designer or somewhere else when i need to change something particular? Also Search bar is visible only when i Save & Preview in another page, which is really time consuming so trial & error is really not possible. 

FYI: Theme Designer is updated and no issues indicated in report  WDG_MAINTAIN_UR_MIMES

Many thanks.

entry.title: Dual line chart using macros and odata v4
entry.content:
Dear experts,

I am facing some problems to implement a chart in Fiori, using macros, xml annotations and odata v4. It works when I only have one dimension, but fails when the second is included.

The annotation "@Aggregation.default: #SUM" is included in the entity view, and the xml annotation is being used as follow:

<edmx:Edmx xmlns:edmx="http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/ns/edmx" Version="4.0">
    <edmx:Reference Uri="https://sap.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/Analytics.xml">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.Analytics.v1" Alias="Analytics"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="https://oasis-tcs.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/Org.OData.Aggregation.V1.xml">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="Org.OData.Aggregation.V1" Alias="Aggregation"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="https://sap.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/Common.xml">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1" Alias="Common"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="https://oasis-tcs.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/Org.OData.Capabilities.V1.xml">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="Org.OData.Capabilities.V1" Alias="Capabilities"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="https://sap.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/HTML5.xml">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.HTML5.v1" Alias="HTML5"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="https://sap.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/UI.xml">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1" Alias="UI"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:Reference Uri="/sap/opu/odata4/sap/zui_newblick/srvd/sap/zsd_newblick/0001/$metadata">
        <edmx:Include Namespace="com.sap.gateway.srvd.zsd_newblick.v0001" Alias="SAP__self"/>
    </edmx:Reference>
    <edmx:DataServices>
        <Schema xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/ns/edm" Namespace="local">

            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.Container/ZI_BLK_OPEN_RESOLVED">
                <Annotation Term="Aggregation.ApplySupported">
                    <Record Type="Aggregation.ApplySupportedType">
                        <PropertyValue Property="Transformations">
                            <Collection>
                                <String>aggregate</String>
                                <String>groupby</String>
                            </Collection>
                        </PropertyValue>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregatableProperties">
                            <Collection>
                                <Record Type="Aggregation.AggregatablePropertyType">
                                    <PropertyValue Property="Property">
                                        <PropertyPath>openTickets</PropertyPath>
                                    </PropertyValue>
                                </Record>
                                <Record Type="Aggregation.AggregatablePropertyType">
                                    <PropertyValue Property="Property">
                                        <PropertyPath>resolvedTickets</PropertyPath>
                                    </PropertyValue>
                                </Record>
                            </Collection>
                        </PropertyValue>
                        <PropertyValue Property="GroupableProperties">
                            <Collection>
                                <PropertyPath>openResolvedDate</PropertyPath>
                            </Collection>
                        </PropertyValue>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>
            </Annotations>

            <Annotations Target="SAP__self.ZI_BLK_OPEN_RESOLVEDType">
                
                <Annotation Term="UI.Chart" Qualifier="TicketsOpenResolved">
					<Record Type="UI.ChartDefinitionType">
						<PropertyValue Property="Title" String="Open x Resolved" />
						<PropertyValue Property="ChartType" EnumMember="UI.ChartType/Line" />
						<PropertyValue Property="Description" String="Open x Resolved Tickets" />
                        <PropertyValue Property="Dimensions">
							<Collection>
								<PropertyPath>openResolvedDate</PropertyPath>
							</Collection>
						</PropertyValue>
                        <PropertyValue Property="DimensionAttributes">
							<Collection>
								<Record Type="UI.ChartDimensionAttributeType">
									<PropertyValue Property="Dimension" PropertyPath="openResolvedDate" />
									<PropertyValue Property="Role" EnumMember="UI.ChartDimensionRoleType/Category" />
								</Record>
							</Collection>
						</PropertyValue>
                        <PropertyValue Property="Measures">
                            <Collection>
                                <PropertyPath>openTickets</PropertyPath>
                                <PropertyPath>resolvedTickets</PropertyPath>
                            </Collection>
                        </PropertyValue>
                        <PropertyValue Property="DynamicMeasures">
                            <Collection>
                                <AnnotationPath>@Analytics.AggregatedProperty</AnnotationPath>
                                <AnnotationPath>@Analytics.AggregatedProperty#ResolvedSum</AnnotationPath>
                            </Collection>
                        </PropertyValue>
						<PropertyValue Property="MeasureAttributes">
							<Collection>
								<Record Type="UI.ChartMeasureAttributeType">
									<PropertyValue Property="Measure" PropertyPath="openTickets" />
									<PropertyValue Property="Role" EnumMember="UI.ChartMeasureRoleType/Axis1" />
								</Record>
                                <Record Type="UI.ChartMeasureAttributeType">
                                    <PropertyValue Property="Measure" PropertyPath="resolvedTickets" />
                                    <PropertyValue Property="Role" EnumMember="UI.ChartMeasureRoleType/Axis1" />
                                </Record>
							</Collection>
						</PropertyValue>
						
					</Record>
				</Annotation>

                <Annotation Term="Analytics.AggregatedProperty">
                    <Record Type="Analytics.AggregatedPropertyType" >
                        <PropertyValue Property="Name" String="openSum"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregationMethod" String="sum"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregatableProperty" PropertyPath="openTickets"/>
                        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="Open Tickets"/>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>
                <Annotation Term="Analytics.AggregatedProperty" Qualifier="ResolvedSum" >
                    <Record Type="Analytics.AggregatedPropertyType">
                        <PropertyValue Property="Name" String="resolvedSum"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregationMethod" String="sum"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregatableProperty" PropertyPath="resolvedTickets"/>
                        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="Resolved Tickets"/>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>

            </Annotations>

        </Schema>
    </edmx:DataServices>
</edmx:Edmx>

The chart opens with the message "To start, set the relevant filters and choose "Go" when even there isn't any filter to be applied. 

Its associated batch call returns the errors:  "Dynamic property 'openSum' not provided by provider application", "Property 'openSum' not found". The attribute in the backend entity is openTickets, and the aggregated property in the xml annotation is "openSum", which doesn't fail with only one dimension, but It does fail with two. 

<Annotation Term="Analytics.AggregatedProperty">
                    <Record Type="Analytics.AggregatedPropertyType" >
                        <PropertyValue Property="Name" String="openSum"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregationMethod" String="sum"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregatableProperty" PropertyPath="openTickets"/>
                        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="Open Tickets"/>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>
                <Annotation Term="Analytics.AggregatedProperty" Qualifier="ResolvedSum" >
                    <Record Type="Analytics.AggregatedPropertyType">
                        <PropertyValue Property="Name" String="resolvedSum"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregationMethod" String="sum"/>
                        <PropertyValue Property="AggregatableProperty" PropertyPath="resolvedTickets"/>
                        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="Resolved Tickets"/>
                    </Record>
                </Annotation>

What could be wrong in my xml annotation?

entry.title: App Monitor Email Transmissions does not show mail body
entry.content:
Hi,

We started using App Monitoring Email Transmissions App ID F5442 for email monitoring which is similar tcode SOSG.

However it is not showing the mail body content and no such option is available as well. 

Refer below screen shot for available email details from the App page.  Any thoughts... !

Thanks,

entry.title: SAP Tables for Fiori Groups and Tile Instances
entry.content:
Hi All,
I'm looking for Fiori Groups and it's Tile Instances Relationship. Is there a way where I can find this details?

I checked

  1. Table: /UI2/PB_C_PAGE (Cache for UI2 Pagebuilding Service: Page Header)
  2. INPUT: ID = <BUSINESS_GROUP_ID>
  3. OUTPUT: {"order": ["XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX", "linkOrder": []]

But I'm not able to understand where I can find references of XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.

Please let me know.

Thanks

entry.title: "Note Text" in My Purchase Requisitions New
entry.content:
Hello,

In the app "My Purchase Requisitions New" (F1643A), there is a field "Note Text" when we press on "View All" in the list of PR created by me, and we select this field within the "Settings button".

When I add this field in the view, it is always empty on my side, despite of having record several texts when I have created the PR.

Does anybody know how this field is populated?

entry.title: Add a custom field to the app "Stock - Multiple Materials" (F1595)
entry.content:
Hello folks,

we'd like to extend the app "Stock - Multiple Materials" (F1595) to a custom field which is stored in the MARC table. This field is in an append to the MARC table and in the customer namespace. It should be displayed in the result table of the app.

Is this possible without a modification on the ODATA layer?  

If yes, could you please advice how this is done? 

 

We really appreciate your support!

Best regards,

Chris

entry.title: Show to PO creator comments enetered in Myinbox FIORI
entry.content:
Hi, 
How can we display comments enetered by approvers in Fiori Myinbox to document creator who is not in workflow

entry.title: Insert a New Row into table at a specific Index using Odata v4
entry.content:
Hi Forum,

I have an issue , Please help me in resolving it!!!

When I am trying to create a row with the following code:

// Get the list binding from the table's "items" aggregation
var oListBinding = oTable.getBinding("items");
var oInitialData = {
"site": "1000",
"storage_location":"1234",
"article_doc_num": "1234",
"article_doc_num_itm":"1"
};
// Create a new entry (context)
var oNewContext = oListBinding.create(oInitialData);

The new row is getting created at the beginning of the table, but I want the row to be added at a specific index.


Please suggest a solution for this.
